entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain showers and flurries beginning late in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 80. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
